# reloadVisibleMenu()

**Instance Method**

Updates the actions an edit menu displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func reloadVisibleMenu()
```

## Discussion

You use this method to update the actions the menu displays. The method calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIEditMenuInteractionDelegate/editMenuInteraction(_:menuFor:suggestedActions:)] and updates the UI with the menu the delegate returns. The method has no effect if no menu is present.

## Managing edit menu interactions

- **delegate**: An object that customizes presentation of the menu and actions to display for an edit menu interaction.
- **presentEditMenu(with:)**: Presents an edit menu using the object you provide for configuration.
- **updateVisibleMenuPosition(animated:)**: Updates the position of the currently visible menu with an option to animate the action.
- **dismissMenu()**: Dismiss the edit menu if present.
- **location(in:)**: Returns the location of the user interaction in the specified view’s coordinate system.
